text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn I'm not allowed to tell you how I feel or I'll get banned by Twitter. You are a flat out liar - not even a good one at that! You said Pres Trump talking about the Flynn case before Coronavirus was outrageous. For 2 months you talked about impeachment while Coronavirus spread.
